charinfo.name: Yakushi Kabuto (S)
charinfo.description: Kabuto(s) is the loyal servant of Orochimaru and is a very dangerous missing-nin. He is a calculating individual who is both accomplished at combat and healing. Original Design: Oreacharound and Lorddallas

abilities.name: Charging Mystical Palm
abilities.description: Kabuto(s) strikes an enemy dealing 20 damage to them. For 1 turn that enemy cannot use skills with healing effects (this is a stun effect).

abilities.name: Dead Soul Jutsu
abilities.description: Kabuto(s) summons a dead soul to attack one enemy dealing 35 piercing damage to them. For 2 turns that enemy will ignore healing effects.

abilities.name: Medical Ninjutsu
abilities.description: Using advanced medical techniques, Kabuto (S) heals an ally or himself for 25 health and removes all  enemy afflictions from them.

abilities.name: Precise Evasion
abilities.description: This skill makes Yakushi Kabuto(s) invulnerable for 1 turn.
